plot: Girl leaves the nunnery and marries the gardener's son, just for the money. But before the couple consummates their marriage, she finds out he's her half-brother.
title: A Scent of Heather
plot_es: Girl leaves the nunnery and marries the gardener's son, just for the money. But before the couple consummates their marriage, she finds out he's her half-brother.
plot_en: Girl leaves the nunnery and marries the gardener's son, just for the money. But before the couple consummates their marriage, she finds out he's her half-brother.
